txt.en: A little thief has just stolen a priceless bracelet from a noblewoman!
The child is very sorry for what he did and gives you the bracelet
The child is in his hiding place.\n\nYou should scold the child for stealing.
The noblewoman can be found near Pipers' Bend on the Fourth Circle of Minas Tirith.\n\nYou should return the bracelet to the noblewoman.
Return the bracelet to the noblewoman

'Oh, thank you very much! I was afraid I would never see this bracelet again. It was my mother's, and her mother's before.\n\n'I shall continue on my way to the Houses of Healing where I am currently training. If you have not already visited the Sixth Circle, there are some beautiful gardens to be admired. I do recommend a peaceful rest for the mind now and again, even in these dreadful times.'

'You, kind [placeholder]! Some errand-boy ran into me in the tunnels just now and it seems my bracelet has suddenly gone missing! I chased him towards Pipers' Bend but can't find the thieving child! The bracelet is a family heirloom and I must have it back!'\n\nYou spot the child thief and assure the woman that you will retrieve her bracelet and give the child a stern talking to.
The child has run off somewhere.\n\nFollow the child to get the bracelet for the noblewoman.
Looks like this child has been taking various valuables and stashing them here
